message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of the value it brings. I can do $135, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we meet at $125?
I'm glad we're still in negotiations! I can see you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $130?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Can we try $128?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, and I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to make a small concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $132?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get the best deal I can. Can we meet at $127?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to meet you at $129, but that's as low as I can go.
